channel.title: Lorentz Symmetry Nonexistant
channel.description:
http://news.branyvnimani.cz/?article_id=11475
Very interesting theory and I believe this may actually be the answer to quantum gravity. I like it because it does away with dark matter and dark energy, which I believe is nonsensical. We created dark matter and dark energy to explain phenomenon that the current model of physics cannot explain, which I believe is the incorrect way about the problem. This is not the first time science has done this either. Look up the ether and phlogiston. I love how you also cannot directly detect dark matter but it is there. That makes a lot of sense. Very interesting regardless and I cannot wait to read more about the developments of this theory. Also an interesting read that was linked in the article.
http://www.newscientist.com/article/mg19125591.700-quantum-weirdness-on-the-end-of-your-pencil.html
Whoever creates a process to manufacture graphene industrially will have a gold mine.
